message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: String[] designatedArray = new String[52];
int index = 0;
for(Iterator<String> it = list.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
  String card = it.next();
  if(Character.isUpperCase(card.charAt(0))){
    designatedArray[index] = "*";
  } else {
    designatedArray[index] = card;
  }
  index++;
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can create a designated array of size 52 and iterate over the list of cards using an iterator. Check if the first character of each card is uppercase, and if so, assign "*" to the corresponding index in the designated array. Otherwise, assign the card value to the designated array. Increment the index after each iteration.
